thread.title: Olly Murs premieres his smooth new single 'Kiss Me' - Music
thread.title_full: Olly Murs premieres his smooth new single 'Kiss Me' - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Megan Davies
title: Olly Murs premieres his smooth new single 'Kiss Me' - Music
text: Olly Murs has debuted his new single 'Kiss Me'.Following on from the snippets provided by Murs's musical lips earlier this week, the X Factor presenter's new track is now available to listen to in full.The track is taken from a repackaged version of his 2014 album Never Been Better and is one of seven new songs to be featured on the special edition, which will be released on November 20.Murs has previously revealed that a new album won't be forthcoming until 2016 to allow him to focus on his work on The X Factor. Â© ITV / Thames Speaking to Digital Spy about the ITV reality show's ratings troubles, Murs argued that the press seem to have a vendetta against it."I don't think it's suffering as much as the press want to make out," he said. "The press just seem to have this vendetta against The X Factor. "The fact of the matter is, the show is all about finding talent and giving people the opportunity to seek out their dreams, and I think that's what we all want to try and get."The singer presents The X Factor with Caroline Flack. The ITV show continues on Sunday (October 11) at 7pm.
